story.title: The Time Loop Paradox
story.author: Dr. Sarah Chen
story.description: Trapped in a repeating day, you must uncover the mystery and break free from the temporal prison.

nodes.title: Morning Again
nodes.narration: Your alarm rings at 7:00 AM. Again. This is the 47th time you've woken up to this exact moment. The same sunlight, the same bird chirping outside, the same coffee stain on your ceiling.

nodes.title: The Journal
nodes.narration: Your journal is filled with notes from previous loops. "Day 47: The quantum stabilizer malfunctions at 3:47 PM. Dr. Martinez always spills coffee at 10:23 AM. The security code changes daily but follows a pattern."
